full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I BAM SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'DOD KHAMS DBANG PHYUG MA'I THUGS DAM BSKANGS PA DANG, 'GAL RKYEN GYI 'TSUB LHOD SOGS ZHI BA LA MCHOG TU BSNGAGS PA, SROG CHAGS RGYU SKYONGS DANG, BAM GYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR YANG SNYEGS MAR SPYOD PA'I DBANG GIS MA MO MKHA' 'GRO 'KHRUGS PA'I 'TSUB LHOD KYIS BSKYED PA'I NAD GDON SHIN TU MANG BA DANG, LHAG PAR PO LNGA PHYI NYE BSKOR DU NAD RIMS @007B RIGS MI 'DRA BA MANG DU 'CHED CING, MI SHES PA'I LTAS MTSAN SNA TSOGS BYUNG BA, BSRUNG MA'I 'KHU SDOG GI RNAM PA YIN PA DANG, BSKANGS BSHAGS MANG DU BTANG NA LEGS PA'I MTSAN MA KUN RTOGS KYI RI MOR SHAR BA BZHIN, ^BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BAM SKONGS KYI CHO GA LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN LAS KYI RDO RJE'I GSUNG LA TSIGS PHRAN CUNG ZAD BSGYUR CING, LAG LEN GSAL BAR BGYIS TE, DPEN GNAS BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DU KLAG THOG CHU 'BABS SU BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG MI MTHUN NYER 'TSE THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING, 'DOD KHAMS DBANG MO DGYES PAS 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS GRUB PAR GYUR CIG ,'DI GNYAN PAS, GAR THOD THOD DU BYA MI RUNG GSUNG BAS SNOD MIN LA GSANG SHING SKABS SHES PAR BYA'O,, ,,)
